basics.name: vm_Name
basics.label: Virtual Machine name
basics.toolTip: Chose an unique name which identifys your virtual machine.

constraints.validationMessage: The value should not be empty has less then 16 characters. The VM name must contain only letters and numbers.

elements.name: user_Name
elements.label: User name
elements.toolTip: This user name can be used to connect via Remote Desktop to your virtual machine.

constraints.validationMessage: The value should not be empty.

elements.name: password
elements.toolTip: Passwords must be at least 8 characters long, contain a letter, a number, and a special character

constraints.validationMessage: Passwords must be at least 8 characters long, contain a letter, a number, and a special character

basics.name: windows_OS_Version
basics.label: VM OS version
basics.toolTip: Choose an OS version. To save costs, chose Windows Server 2016 Core [Smalldisk]. Windows Server 2016 Core [smalldisk] is console only and has just 30GB disk size.

subLabel.preValidation: Chose a VM Size. We strongly recommend to SSD.

elements.name: vm_Size
elements.label: VM Size
elements.toolTip: Select a size for your VM

elements.name: server_URL
elements.label: VSTS Account Name
elements.toolTip: You can find your account name in your VSTS URL: https://{your_account_Name}.visualstudio.com

constraints.validationMessage: The value should not be empty.

elements.name: agent_Pool_Name
elements.label: Agent Pool
elements.toolTip: Specify the agentpool where your agent will be registered.

constraints.validationMessage: The value should not be empty.

elements.name: agent_Name
elements.label: Agent name
elements.toolTip: Specify a name for your private build agent. Agent names should be unique within a agent pool

constraints.validationMessage: The value should not be empty.

elements.name: pat_Token
elements.toolTip: Enter the Personal Acces Token which would be used to authenticate against Visual Studio Teamservices account to download and configure agent. [How to generate a PAT](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/vsts/accounts/use-personal-access-tokens-to-authenticate)

constraints.validationMessage: The value should not be empty.
